Summary 4+ years of working as a Corporate Financial Analyst at a public technology firm, a midsize startup and currently at Google as part of the Google Shopping Express team, I have had the opportunity to manage, analyze, forecast and do reporting on fiscal budgets, departmental opex, COGS, fixed assets, CapEx and company wide P&L, along with headcount analysis and accounting reconciliation. I strive to build strong partnership with stake holders and business partners and executives, delivering accurate and timely financial data that facilitate meaningful decision making. My technical aptitude in understanding core technology and systems, helps me integrate a comprehensive view of the company further enabling me to build stronger partnerships across cross functional teams, providing best in class financial analysis.
